resources.string: Increase element count cap to see list
Swipe elements left and right to merge them

"
Game Elements was designed and developed by Lauri Kosonen."
"


ELEMENT COUNTS"
"

- Total: %s elements" "

- [Wld] World: %s elements" "
- [Cha] Character: %s elements" "
- [Grp] Group: %s elements" "
- [Inf] Influence: %s elements" "
- [IAc] Interaction: %s elements" "
- [Abi] Abilities: %s elements" "
- [Nav] Navigation: %s elements" "
- [Com] Combat: %s elements" "
- [Thi] Thinking: %s elements" "
- [Itm] Items: %s elements" "
- [Go] Goal: %s elements" "
- [AV] Audio & Visuals: %s elements" "
- [Msc] Miscellaneous: %s elements" "
- [Fnd] Fundamentals: %s"
"


FEATURES" "

- Modes: Classic, List, Merge, Merge Alt, Choose One, Fundamentals," "Fundamentals+Element" "
- Tap to lock an element. Works in all modes. Locked results will stay on screen." "
- Tap again to change lock color. This can be used to separate results into two locked" "and one unlocked group." "
- Tap a third time to remove lock" "
- Tap empty space to add an element" "
- Hold to remove an element" "
- Press the big blue button to replace all unlocked results and fill empty spaces" "
- In the two Merge modes, swipe left to copy that result's beginning to all results" "
- Similarly, swipe right to copy that result's end to all results" "
- In the drop-down menu, you'll find mode selection, clearing all elements," "clearing locks, category selection, and more" "
- Element count can be changed to suit your needs" "
- Merge Slot can be used to merge elements anywhere"
"


[Exit the help screen with your device's back button.]"
